securitySection.title: Security Disclaimer

points.point1: Only your password is securely protected.
points.point2: Other account information (such as name, email) is not guaranteed to be secure.
points.point3: Conversation/Chat Content: The confidentiality of all conversation content is not guaranteed.
points.point4: Conversations may become accidentally accessible or visible to third parties.
